arg.argvalue: if [[ `sed -e 's/.*\s\(.*\)/\1/' -ne '/^[^0$]/p' L1AV.txt | wc -l` == 0 ]]; then echo "L1 counts ERROR : all entries are ZERO, please consult L1AV.txt" ; fi
if [[ `sed -e 's/.*\s\(.*\)/\1/' -ne '/^[^0$]/p' HLTChain.txt | wc -l` == 0 ]]; then echo "HLT chain counts ERROR : all entries are ZERO, please consult HLTChain.txt" ; fi
if [[ `sed -e 's/.*\s\(.*\)/\1/' -ne '/^[^0$]/p' HLTTE.txt | wc -l` == 0 ]]; then echo "HLT TE counts ERROR : all entries are ZERO, please consult HLTTE.txt" ; fi
monHistoChecker.py --path / | awk '{ if ($2==0){print "expert-monitoring.root check ERROR : monHistoChecker.py: integral of "$1" equals zero"} }'
